name: Chad Geiger in: A Waist of Time
name_original: Chad Geiger in: A Waist of Time
description:
Your name is Chad Geiger, Giga-Chad, Pilot extraordinaire and Hero of the Free World.

You were sent on a mission to raid the Unassailable II, a zeppelin research facility belonging to "THE" Empire (they’ve had copyright issues with other “Empires”).
Upon arrival, an inter-dimensional experiment has gone awry, and now the crew of the Unassailable II are all mind-controlled zombies serving some kind of unimaginable
(also, undrawable) monster (pictured off-screen, we couldn't draw it in time, but your imagination is scarier, if you could imagine it).

Heroically crashing your plane into the zeppelin, you armed yourself with an array of strange experimental devices such as the Space-Time Paraclock Belt
that allows you to reverse time on death, as well as the Dice-On-Sphere D.O.S; a device that harnesses randomised energies that allow you to shoot warp bombs,
move slightly quicker and best of all, punch things!

Thankfully these heinous fiends are held at bay by the power of the Paraclock! Consider your next move carefully, it may be your last!

Game Design/Paper Prototyping/Narrative Design: Alex Dullow
Music & Sound Design: Nic Dullow
Art & Animation: Lachlan Pini
Programming and Project Management: Andrew Banagala

CONTROLS:
Select Card/Tile/Button: Left Click
Deselect Card: Right Click
Move Up: W
Move Left: A
Move Down: S
Move Right: D
